info.craftplanet.add_words: To add words, go to you mod folder, then config/craftplanet and go into the harmful_words.txt file. Each line represents a custom blocked Word!
settings.craftplanet.filterChat_tooltip: If this is enabled, the chat will not display any messages that contain harmful content
settings.craftplanet.disableArmorRenderi: If this is enabled, the armors will not be rendered
settings.craftplanet.disableWeatherRende: If this is enabled, all weather effects like sound or particles won't get rendered
settings.craftplanet.maxParticles_toolti: The maximum amount of Particles that can be rendered at the same time
settings.craftplanet.maxSignTextRenderin: The maximum distance of Sign Texts that get rendered
settings.craftplanet.maxItemFrameRenderi: The maximum distance of Item Frames that get rendered
settings.craftplanet.maxBlockEntityRende: The maximum distance of Block Entities that get rendered
settings.craftplanet.maxEntityRenderDist: The maximum distance of Entities that get rendered
